# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your needs perfectly. Given its value and quality, I believe it's worth more than what the market suggests. Considering its significance to you, I propose to sell it to you for $95. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the opportunity to own a piece that aligns with your preferences and possibly increases in value over time. I look forward to your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95.

(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
